hero_subtitle: Ekobol is Me the Tech's "thinking code" philosophy. More than a tool that unifies marketplaces; it is an autonomous growth engine designed for you to dominate the digital world.

protocol.title: THE GROWTH PROTOCOL
protocol.subtitle: A self-reinforcing cybernetic loop. The machine that feeds itself.

integration.title: INTEGRATION
integration.desc: Raw Data Ingestion. Connecting APIs, Marketplaces, and Inventory Streams.

intelligence.title: INTELLIGENCE
intelligence.desc: Neural Analysis. Competitor scanning, Price elasticity modeling, Opportunity detection.

synthesis.title: SYNTHESIS
synthesis.desc: Asset Generation. AI visual rendering, Copywriting, Strategic positioning.

domination.title: DOMINATION
domination.desc: Market Execution. Ad launch, Sales conversion, Profit realization.

playground_title: AI Playground: The Power of Creation
playground_subtitle: Witness how an ordinary product transforms into a market phenomenon with Ekobol's artificial intelligence.
playground_desc_content: Rewrite the rules of the street. Designed for urban exploration, the 'Nebula' model combines breathable composite mesh and a reactive foam sole. With every step, don't just walk, flow into the future.
final_cta_subtitle: Define the new rules of digital commerce. Transition to limitless infrastructure equipped with autonomous growth engines. Your empire awaits.
automation_nexus_subtitle: Transform your business processes with Ekobol's AI-powered automation, maximize efficiency, and leave your competitors behind. An interactive experience covering all site capabilities and workflows.

forge.label: FORGE
forge.title: AI Product Imaging & Content
forge.description: Connect marketplaces and upload products. Let AI generate stunning visuals and compelling descriptions.

amplify.label: AMPLIFY
amplify.title: Smart Marketing & Pricing
amplify.description: Unleash AI to create hypnotic campaigns and execute unbeatable pricing strategies.

dominate.label: COMMAND
dominate.title: Unified Command Center
dominate.description: Rule your empire from a single panel. Dominate the market with real-time data.

seo_analysis.label: RANK
seo_analysis.title: SEO & Trend Analysis
seo_analysis.description: Before launch, AI analyzes market trends, SEO keywords, and competitor strategies to position your product for maximum impact.

competitor_analysis.label: INSPECT
competitor_analysis.title: Competitor Intelligence
competitor_analysis.description: Gain an unfair advantage with deep insights into competitor pricing, marketing, and product strategies.

ai_descriptions.label: WRITE
ai_descriptions.title: AI-Optimized Descriptions
ai_descriptions.description: Generate compelling, keyword-rich product descriptions tailored to your brand voice and target audience.

ai_visuals.label: DESIGN
ai_visuals.title: AI-Generated Product Visuals
ai_visuals.description: From a simple idea or sketch, Ekobol AI creates stunning, photorealistic product images and visualizations.

ai_learning.label: EVOLVE
ai_learning.title: Continuous AI Learning
ai_learning.description: Our AI agents constantly monitor market data, learn from performance, and autonomously refine strategies for ongoing growth.

connectivity.label: CORE
connectivity.title: Marketplace Integration
connectivity.description: Seamlessly connect and manage all your sales channels from one central hub.

insights.label: CORE
insights.title: Real-time Analytics
insights.description: Gain deep insights into your sales, customers, and market behavior to stay ahead.
